# gitea_teams (Data Source)

Fetches a list of teams. Can list teams for an organization or all teams for the authenticated user.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `org` (String) Organization to list teams for. If not specified, lists all teams for the authenticated user.

### Read-Only

- `teams` (Attributes List) List of teams (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--teams))

<a id="nestedatt--teams"></a>
### Nested Schema for `teams`

Read-Only:

- `can_create_org_repo` (Boolean) Whether team members can create org repositories
- `description` (String) Team description
- `id` (Number) Team ID
- `includes_all_repositories` (Boolean) Whether the team has access to all repositories
- `name` (String) Team name
- `permission` (String) Team permission level
